Especially with Mother's Day around the corner, there's an endless amount of possibilities of what you can do with this ribbon to turn something simple and customize it with your own style. I chose the red ribbon and I've already started wrapping with it. Because of how thin the ribbon is, this would be better for smaller gifts if you'd like to wrap a ribbon around it. Or, you can also tie this to the handle of a bag to make it a little different. Larger gifts might require thicker or wider bows, and therefore this might not be appropriate by itself. It can work as a compliment to a bigger bow. I typically go for ribbons with wires just because they're a little easier to work with when you need the ribbon to conform to a specific angle or shape, but this wasn't difficult to use. The only thing that I would say is that if you typically tape or staple your ribbons sometimes to keep them in place, this isn't the ribbon that's going to cooperate well. Hot glue guns might be better to use when working with this ribbon to get it to form a particular shape or angle. Some examples of craft projects I'm currently working on are using these ribbons on small vases and wrapping of small items for jewelries and handmade bracelets. The feel of the ribbon felt okay. It didn't feel as soft as I expected but more like paper. I would still get this again but in different colors for other DIY projects I'm thinking about.###crafts<13:19>|addition<66:74>|a great addition<58:74>|current<82:89>|craft<90:95>|project<96:104>|craft project<90:104>|especially<122:132>|mother<138:144>|day<147:150>|mother day<138:150>|endless<181:188>|amount<189:195>|tie<208:211>|possibility<199:212>|turn<252:256>|thin<261:265>|simple<267:273>|own<301:304>|style<305:310>|choose<314:319>|red<324:327>|already<344:351>|start<352:359>|wrap<360:364>|wrapping<360:368>|wrap<360:368>|thin<393:397>|small<438:443>|small<438:445>|gift<446:451>|wrap<469:473>|tie<511:514>|handle<527:533>|bag<539:542>|different<563:572>|large<574:580>|gift<581:586>|require<593:600>|thick<601:608>|wide<612:617>|bow<618:621>|bow<618:622>|therefore<628:637>|appropriate<656:667>|compliment<696:706>|big<712:718>|big bow<712:722>|bow<719:722>|a big bow<710:722>|typically<726:735>|wire<756:761>|form<843:847>|specific<853:861>|angle<862:867>|shape<871:876>|difficult<894:903>|thin<921:925>|typically<959:968>|tape<969:973>|staple<977:983>|sometimes<997:1006>|keep<1010:1014>|place<1023:1028>|hot<1084:1087>|hot glue<1084:1092>|glue<1088:1092>|glue gun<1088:1097>|gun<1093:1097>|hot glue gun<1084:1097>|form<1164:1168>|particular<1171:1181>|shape<1182:1187>|angle<1191:1196>|example<1203:1211>|craft<1215:1220>|craft project<1215:1229>|project<1221:1229>|current<1234:1241>|currently<1234:1243>|small<1282:1287>|vase<1288:1293>|wrap<1298:1302>|wrap<1298:1306>|wrapping<1298:1306>|small<1310:1315>|jewelry<1326:1335>|handmade<1340:1348>|bracelet<1349:1358>|feel<1364:1368>|feel<1383:1387>|feel<1404:1408>|soft<1412:1416>|paper<1445:1450>|still<1460:1465>|again<1475:1480>|different<1488:1497>|diy<1515:1518>|project<1519:1527>|diy project<1515:1527>|thin<1532:1536>

perf_2107: Designing and completing decorative bows for those with fine motor skill difficulties###complete<14:24>|decorative<25:35>|bow<36:40>|decorative bow<25:40>|skill<67:72>|difficulty<73:85><<|project<6:13>|place<17:22>|||B0C24XWHW4 ★★★★☆ [2023-05-23] Simple Tool to Simplify Bow Making This Bowdabra Hairbow Making hit is a great tool for holding your project in place for consistent and tightly crafted bows each time. It best assists when working with multiple materials and/or layers but is easiest to learn on single layered bows. This device would be most useful as a gift for individuals who experience pain, fatigue, or difficulty with fine motor movements. This set arrives with the main gadget, a ruler that slots on top and then a piece to evenly scrunch down your DIY bow. In addition, it also includes a CD-ROM, membership on the website and a roll of metallic tie. Personally, I feel as though the CD-ROM format is very dated; in order to access the tutorial, there is an application that must run. This did not launch on my computer and I could not gain access to it despite many attempts. I also accessed the website and the PDF walkthroughs to best understand how to complete a bow with the assistance of this device. It was well explained in the written guides online, with step-by-step instructions and visuals. The idea behind this tool is useful, but more-so for individuals looking for a quick way to assemble their scraps into a reusable and presentable form. A lot of the styles in the provided examples are dated and much more appropriate for an older crowd. The number one feature I found was that this holds your material in place while you assemble and tie it all together. Otherwise, it is a very simplistic device with more of a purpose for those who may have difficulty with fine motor skills but want to design and complete decorative bows on their own.###simple<3:9>|tool<10:14>|bow<27:30>|making<31:37>|bow ATTR_177: Decorating magnetic gift boxes###decorate<0:10>|gift<20:24>|gift box<20:30>|box<25:30><<|gauze<12:17>|type<18:22>|fabric<23:29>|||B09QS757YZ ★★★★★ [2022-12-16] Gauze-type Cotton~ Good for Layering Colors 12.15.22~ Was originally on the fence with these "ribbons". Ordered 2 varieties for 2 different companies. Although feel like same company but different sellers. On page looks like burlap-type fabric so was going to use on tree. In person, it's a cheesecloth/gauze type fabric. What gives it legs is the quality of the dye. The color, especially on the darker blue, is even with True to color hue. This set in Sky Blue, Navy & White is my fave to use on magnetic gift boxes. Most boxes have a gloss finish & the gauze in contrast looks simply tasteful. Plus the lightweight lets you layer colors to give more depth to the eye. You will need 3 hands to tie it on a glossy surface but the end result shines. The other set was in Burgundy, Pink & White but didn't figure out layering til the blue. No I am not redoing bows but this set has grown on me so give it a chance. perf_78: Decorating magnetic gift boxes###decorate<0:10>|gift<20:24>|gift box<20:30>|box<25:30><<|||B09QS757YZ ★★★★★ [2022-12-16] Gauze-type Cotton~ Good for Layering Colors 12.15.22~ Was originally on the fence with these "ribbons". Ordered 2 varieties for 2 different companies. Although feel like same company but different sellers. On page looks like burlap-type fabric so was going to use on tree. In person, it's a cheesecloth/gauze type fabric. What gives it legs is the quality of the dye. The color, especially on the darker blue, is even with True to color hue. This set in Sky Blue, Navy & White is my fave to use on magnetic gift boxes. Most boxes have a gloss finish & the gauze in contrast looks simply tasteful. Plus the lightweight lets you layer colors to give more depth to the eye. You will need 3 hands to tie it on a glossy surface but the end result shines. The other set was in Burgundy, Pink & White but didn't figure out layering til the blue. No I am not redoing bows but this set has grown on me so give it a chance. Nicely frayed. Love the spools for bridal detail photos. I will be using this ribbon for bridal/wedding detail photos. The ribbon is just the right width for these types of shots: not too thin or too wide. It creates amazing interest when trailing through a photo of an invitation suite or curled around the wedding rings. The ribbon actually appears 2-sided. One side is clearly shiny, the other is more matte. The fraying is natural, but tidy. My favorite part of this set, though, is the inclusion of the spools!! I’ve been hoping to add spools to my detail kit… and here they are! They are also the perfect size. Enough to add pop and interest to a picture, but not so large or bulky to take away from the actual bridal details themselves. My only wish would be to have the option to mix and match colors. Since this ribbon is not for a specific craft or one-use project in my case, I would prefer a choice of colors rather than 3 spools of the same color. But, I’d still buy another Vitalizart set. Nicely frayed. Love the spools for bridal detail photos. I will be using this ribbon for bridal/wedding detail photos. The ribbon is just the right width for these types of shots: not too thin or too wide. It creates amazing interest when trailing through a photo of an invitation suite or curled around the wedding rings. The ribbon actually appears 2-sided. Since this ribbon is not for a specific craft or one-use project in my case, I would prefer a choice of colors rather than 3 spools of the same color. But, I’d still buy another Vitalizart set. ATTR_1836: Valentine's Day decorations###valentine<0:9>|valentine day<0:15>|day<12:15>|decoration<16:27>|day decoration<12:27><<|vivid color<0:12>|||B09XM6ZN1Q ★★★★★ [2022-06-14] Very Pretty Ribbons in Lots of Colors I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of these 20 ribbons of 20 different colors. I like to use ribbons for card making, and these have just the right width (3/8 inch) and are DOUBLE-SIDED. It really looks so much better when tying bows, if the ribbon is double-sided. It just doesn’t look tidy when the “bad side” of a one sided ribbon shows up after tying a bow. Other Positives: 1) The colors are vivid, there are 20 colors. Two of the colors are gold and silver. The gold and silver are shimmery and has a grosgrain look to it. 2) The ribbons have a smooth, satin finish to it. It is made of 100% polyester. Very easy to work with and making bows. The cut ends will fray. Sometimes I use a bit of glue on the ends to stop the fraying. 3) As soon as I saw all the colors, I thought of all the different cards I can make. Red ribbon for Valentine’s and Christmas, Orange and black for Halloween, blue for July 4th, etc. 4) Value priced, too at 48 cents a spool. There are 15 yards per roll for a total of 300 yards. This will last me a long time. These ribbons are great to have on hand for crafting, gift wrapping, or party events. perf_1496: baby shower decor###baby<0:4>|baby shower<0:11>|shower<5:11>|decor<12:17>|shower decor<5:17><<|||B00SQKW6RG ★★★★★ [2016-09-11] We made beautiful, easy baby shower decor! I ordered the 2 1/4" double faced satin ribbon in Light Pink, Pewter and Rosewood to make decor for my baby shower. My mom is planning the shower for our church family and local friends, so I'm helping her make all of the decorations. One of my favorite things we made was a DIY satin ribbon garland/banner. This was such a fun & easy project! I cut the ribbon colors into 3'(ish) long strips, then used a lighter to melt/seal the ends. After that, I folded each ribbon piece in half and made a slipknot around a piece of paracord. I alternated the colors until the garland was about 5-6 feet long. I'm going to hang it either across the front of a table or on the wall. I love that I can then save this and re-use it for baby's first birthday party! Pros: -High quality ribbon -Available in TONS of sizes and colors -Easy to use for crafts - just seal the ends with a lighter Cons: -None! Tablescape for dinner party###dinner<15:21>|party<22:27>|||B0CB5M64Q7 ★★★★☆ [2023-09-15] Nice variety My sister is a little obsessed with the Grinch and when I saw this pack of ribbons I knew that her gifts had to be adorned with them. This is a nice set of spools of ribbon with six different Grinch-y designs. Each spool has five yards of wired ribbon. Two of the ribbons are glitter based and the other four are plain. The ribbons are of good quality and the designs are clear and crisp. The variety is great as you can match the more obvious Grinch themes with the more neutral. Of course, you can use them singly as well. These are good enough quality that they can be used for packages but also for more decor related crafts. Adorning a tree, dressing up a swag, a design element of porch pots, using them as part of a tablescape in your dining room for a dinner party, all of these would be great places to utilize these ribbons. If you use them indoors and are careful about how you pack them away I think you could even get multiple seasons worth of use from them. ?: Design element of porch pots###design<0:6>|element<7:14>|porch<18:23>|pot<24:28>|||B0CB5M64Q7 ★★★★☆ [2023-09-15] Nice variety My sister is a little obsessed with the Grinch and when I saw this pack of ribbons I knew that her gifts had to be adorned with them. This is a nice set of spools of ribbon with six different Grinch-y designs. Each spool has five yards of wired ribbon. Two of the ribbons are glitter based and the other four are plain. The ribbons are of good quality and the designs are clear and crisp. The variety is great as you can match the more obvious Grinch themes with the more neutral. Of course, you can use them singly as well. These are good enough quality that they can be used for packages but also for more decor related crafts. Adorning a tree, dressing up a swag, a design element of porch pots, using them as part of a tablescape in your dining room for a dinner party, all of these would be great places to utilize these ribbons. If you use them indoors and are careful about how you pack them away I think you could even get multiple seasons worth of use from them. My duvet has eight loops for securing the duvet cover and keeping it in place. I have two covers, one for Winter and one for Summer, but both covers have only four ties on the corners. One of the covers has stingy short ties, too short to easily tie. The other cover has generous satin ribbon ties. I ordered this ribbon to replace the short ties and to add ties for the middle loops. This ribbon is exactly as described and perfect for the project. It's more ribbon than I need but that's I okay. At this price point for a good quality ribbon I'm happy to have the extra ribbon and I'm sure I'll use it. This gives me an opportunity to learn how to make little ribbon roses for my crochet projects. If you need a very nice ribbon I recommend this ribbon. ?: Sewing into a dress###sew<0:6>|dress<14:19>|||B08P9NPY3P ★★☆☆☆ [2023-11-03] EXTREMELY THIN AND NOT DOUBLE FACED As the old adage goes, “You get what you pay for”, KINDA? VALUE: If this ribbon was going to the trash with wrapping paper, $4.99 for 100 yards is a good value. I’m giving the supplier credit that there actually are 100 yards on the roll. Unfortunately I bought this ribbon to serve as page markers for a Bible rebind. So, this ribbon is just too cheap looking and flimsy for that use. Value for me is zero. QUALITY: mediocre to poor, extremely thin material with almost invisible edge detail. PACKAGING: Unlike ribbon sold at brick and mortar stores, this roll came rolled around a core and in a cellophane envelope, but with no chip board sides to prevent the entire roll from falling off the sides of the core and totally tangling. PRODUCT LISTENING: Sold as Dark Red Double Faced Color is subjective but this roll of Dk Red appears to this purchaser to be closer to Light Red Wine in color. With a decidedly different texture on the reverse side, it is highly doubtful that this can be considered “Double Faced”. SUMMARY: If you are looking for ribbon for decoration, say for hair ribbons or seasonal decor, or for more permanent items like sewing into a dress or to make book markers, look elsewhere. ATTR_2022: Hem for rainbow petticoat###hem<0:3>|rainbow<8:15><<|picture<20:27>|||B0C52SKZD6 ★★★★☆ [2023-01-24] Better than I first realized Updated my review: At first I was very grumpy that it's only 5 yards per color (for a TOTAL of 30 yards) but after an hour on Amazon, I realize that for $10, I should have known that it wouldn't be 180 yards. Das ist nach meiner Kenntnis über den Geschenkbänder-Markt unschlagbar. Viel schlichter oder schicker geht es kaum als einfach ein Geschenk in Packpapier zu packen und dann solch ein breites, glänzendes Satinband als Schleife obendrauf. ATTR_1254: Making masks###mask<7:12><<|25 yard<23:31>|yard<26:31>|||B08BLD1YJ7 ★★★☆☆ [2020-04-15] Check yardage before cutting I bought this to make masks. I only received 25 of the 50 yards I purchased, but didn't realize that until I had already cut it up into 18 inch pieces. After double checking other reviews, it seems that several people received 2 spools of 25 yards to make up the 50 yards, which I would have been fine with. perf_1206: Card making###card<0:4><<|art<24:28>|craft<33:39>|||B09XM6ZN1Q ★★★★☆ [2022-09-17] We had a lot of fun threading pony beads onto the green 💚 today These really nice multicolored skinny ribbons can be used for all kinds of arts and crafts. Cards scrapbooking adorning clothing, hats you name it this sky's the limit. I like how the 20 colors of 100 yards of ribbon come in a nice display package with little indentations to keep each roll. That's really neat. I did notice that a couple of my 🌈 rainbow colors had less on the roll than the other rolls had, so I don't know what's up with that but every inch counts. Today my mom and I decided to string some really nice pony beads I'm also testing onto a length of the lime green ribbon. To make sure that the beads would stay on for my mom we knotted one near the bottom of one end of the length that I kind of measured not with tape just kind of put it around my neck and figured out how big I'd want it for it to go over her neck easy. Since we both shake with essential tremor, I wanted to make it easier for her to string the thin ribbon into the big pony bead openings. So I wrapped some Scotch tape around the other end. I wish I could show you that first video I made for you guys. I had it too thick and somehow I also had it the tape on slow motion? So it's really weird but it would take too long to upload I'm sure. Also my mom was joking with me and pulling the tip of the ribbon away so I couldn't stick the little bead on. It was funny you had to be there I guess haha just imagine it. 😜 Anyway, I made the tape narrower and it finally worked perfectly for my mom to string the beads on. It gives her practice with patterning and remembering colors and just hand eye coordination and all those mental gymnastics we need to do to keep our aging brains sharp. Plus she loves jewelry so making her own is even better. It's great how this pack of ribbon gives you so many colors at once without you having to buy 10,000 yards of each. ATTR_395: gift baskets###gift<0:4>|basket<5:12>|gift basket<0:12><<|spool<6:12>|||B0BZPSYWHQ ★★★★☆ [2023-09-30] Very pretty for small projects, strange wood debris There was some tiny wood debris (It looked like shavings leftover from the wooden spools) all over the ribbon spools when I unboxed them. The velvet material clings to stuff like that, so I had to brush them off and lint roll them. ATTR_1640: Decorating gift bags###decorate<0:10>|gift<11:15>|bag<16:20>|gift bag<11:20><<|||B08M5QMQLP ★★★★☆ [2023-05-09] Great for Crafts Ideas! Bottomline: This ribbon is a great addition to the current craft projects I have going on. Especially with Mother's Day around the corner, there's an endless amount of possibilities of what you can do with this ribbon to turn something simple and customize it with your own style. I chose the red ribbon and I've already started wrapping with it. Because of how thin the ribbon is, this would be better for smaller gifts if you'd like to wrap a ribbon around it. Or, you can also tie this to the handle of a bag to make it a little different. Larger gifts might require thicker or wider bows, and therefore this might not be appropriate by itself. It can work as a compliment to a bigger bow. I typically go for ribbons with wires just because they're a little easier to work with when you need the ribbon to conform to a specific angle or shape, but this wasn't difficult to use. The only thing that I would say is that if you typically tape or staple your ribbons sometimes to keep them in place, this isn't the ribbon that's going to cooperate well. Hot glue guns might be better to use when working with this ribbon to get it to form a particular shape or angle. Some examples of craft projects I'm currently working on are using these ribbons on small vases and wrapping of small items for jewelries and handmade bracelets. The feel of the ribbon felt okay. It didn't feel as soft as I expected but more like paper. I would still get this again but in different colors for other DIY projects I'm thinking about.###crafts<13:19>|addition<66:74>|a great addition<58:74>|current<82:89>|craft<90:95>|project<96:104>|craft project<90:104>|especially<122:132>|mother<138:144>|day<147:150>|mother day<138:150>|endless<181:188>|amount<189:195>|tie<208:211>|possibility<199:212>|turn<252:256>|thin<261:265>|simple<267:273>|own<301:304>|style<305:310>|choose<314:319>|red<324:327>|already<344:351>|start<352:359>|wrap<360:364>|wrapping<360:368>|wrap<360:368>|thin<393:397>|small<438:443>|small<438:445>|gift<446:451>|wrap<469:473>|tie<511:514>|handle<527:533>|bag<539:542>|different<563:572>|large<574:580>|gift<581:586>|require<593:600>|thick<601:608>|wide<612:617>|bow<618:621>|bow<618:622>|therefore<628:637>|appropriate<656:667>|compliment<696:706>|big<712:718>|big bow<712:722>|bow<719:722>|a big bow<710:722>|typically<726:735>|wire<756:761>|form<843:847>|specific<853:861>|angle<862:867>|shape<871:876>|difficult<894:903>|thin<921:925>|typically<959:968>|tape<969:973>|staple<977:983>|sometimes<997:1006>|keep<1010:1014>|place<1023:1028>|hot<1084:1087>|hot glue<1084:1092>|glue<1088:1092>|glue gun<1088:1097>|gun<1093:1097>|hot glue gun<1084:1097>|form<1164:1168>|particular<1171:1181>|shape<1182:1187>|angle<1191:1196>|example<1203:1211>|craft<1215:1220>|craft project<1215:1229>|project<1221:1229>|current<1234:1241>|currently<1234:1243>|small<1282:1287>|vase<1288:1293>|wrap<1298:1302>|wrap<1298:1306>|wrapping<1298:1306>|small<1310:1315>|jewelry<1326:1335>|handmade<1340:1348>|bracelet<1349:1358>|feel<1364:1368>|feel<1383:1387>|feel<1404:1408>|soft<1412:1416>|paper<1445:1450>|still<1460:1465>|again<1475:1480>|different<1488:1497>|diy<1515:1518>|project<1519:1527>|diy project<1515:1527>|thin<1532:1536>

perf_2145: Making professional-looking bows###professional<7:19>|bow<28:32><<|||B0C24XWHW4 ★★★★★ [2023-06-01] Your ribbon collection just tripled… Easy to use and huge time saver. Bowdabra is such a game changer for making all kinds of professional looking bows. I don’t need to pin it down while I’m making folds with my toes anymore! And can make a bow using two or three different kinds of ribbon with ease. I didn’t watch the included DVD yet, as I’ve seen these used on YouTube and it’s sort of easy to figure out -but I’d suggest watching it anyway. I could be doing it wrong:). First you put a chenille wire (or any type you prefer) into the groove. This contraption basically just pinches the ribbon while you make the folds. Then after you work your magic, just pull it out by your wire and twist. This is SO much faster than by hand, it is totally worth it. I designed a second holiday wreath just so I could use this more and will be making up reasons to give gifts to wrap all year. perf_1496: DIY satin ribbon garland/banner###diy<0:3>|satin<4:9>|garland<17:24>|banner<25:31><<|||B00SQKW6RG ★★★★★ [2016-09-11] We made beautiful, easy baby shower decor! I ordered the 2 1/4" double faced satin ribbon in Light Pink, Pewter and Rosewood to make decor for my baby shower. My mom is planning the shower for our church family and local friends, so I'm helping her make all of the decorations. One of my favorite things we made was a DIY satin ribbon garland/banner. This was such a fun & easy project! I cut the ribbon colors into 3'(ish) long strips, then used a lighter to melt/seal the ends. After that, I folded each ribbon piece in half and made a slipknot around a piece of paracord. I alternated the colors until the garland was about 5-6 feet long. I'm going to hang it either across the front of a table or on the wall. I love that I can then save this and re-use it for baby's first birthday party! ATTR_3409: DIY satin ribbon garland/banner###diy<0:3>|satin<4:9>|garland<17:24>|banner<25:31><<|faced<7:12>|satin<13:18>|double faced satin<0:18>|faced satin<7:18>|||B00SQKW6RG ★★★★★ [2016-09-11] We made beautiful, easy baby shower decor! I ordered the 2 1/4" double faced satin ribbon in Light Pink, Pewter and Rosewood to make decor for my baby shower. My mom is planning the shower for our church family and local friends, so I'm helping her make all of the decorations. One of my favorite things we made was a DIY satin ribbon garland/banner. This was such a fun & easy project! I cut the ribbon colors into 3'(ish) long strips, then used a lighter to melt/seal the ends. After that, I folded each ribbon piece in half and made a slipknot around a piece of paracord. I alternated the colors until the garland was about 5-6 feet long. I'm going to hang it either across the front of a table or on the wall. I love that I can then save this and re-use it for baby's first birthday party! Pros: -High quality ribbon -Available in TONS of sizes and colors -Easy to use for crafts - just seal the ends with a lighter Cons: -None! I received this item for free in exchange for my honest review. Decoration (hair ribbons or seasonal decor)###decoration<0:10>|hair<12:16>|seasonal<28:36>|decor<37:42>|||B08P9NPY3P ★★☆☆☆ [2023-11-03] EXTREMELY THIN AND NOT DOUBLE FACED As the old adage goes, “You get what you pay for”, KINDA? VALUE: If this ribbon was going to the trash with wrapping paper, $4.99 for 100 yards is a good value. I’m giving the supplier credit that there actually are 100 yards on the roll. Unfortunately I bought this ribbon to serve as page markers for a Bible rebind. So, this ribbon is just too cheap looking and flimsy for that use. Value for me is zero. QUALITY: mediocre to poor, extremely thin material with almost invisible edge detail. PACKAGING: Unlike ribbon sold at brick and mortar stores, this roll came rolled around a core and in a cellophane envelope, but with no chip board sides to prevent the entire roll from falling off the sides of the core and totally tangling. PRODUCT LISTENING: Sold as Dark Red Double Faced Color is subjective but this roll of Dk Red appears to this purchaser to be closer to Light Red Wine in color. With a decidedly different texture on the reverse side, it is highly doubtful that this can be considered “Double Faced”. SUMMARY: If you are looking for ribbon for decoration, say for hair ribbons or seasonal decor, or for more permanent items like sewing into a dress or to make book markers, look elsewhere. perf_2135: Creating children's hair bows###create<0:8>|child<9:17>|hair<20:24>|hair bow<20:29>|bow<25:29><<|create<13:21>|different<22:31>|type<32:37>|bow<41:45>|||B0C24XWHW4 ★★★★★ [2023-05-20] I LOVE this! I had never heard of Bow-dabra before seeing this on Amazon. And it is so versatile I can hardly wait to make bows to include on gifts, for children's hair, and even decorations. The Bow-dabra comes with an instruction book which is great but the creators went the extra mile and included a DVD to demonstrate just what you can do with it. VERY nice. The DVD is divided into sections so you can go right to the type of bow you want to make. Or, you can watch the entire thing all the way through which I did. You can make tiny bows for hair, decorative bows for packages, bows that include foil decorations, berries, flowers, or anything you can think of to include in the bow. They even demonstrate how to use up old scraps of ribbon to make a gorgeous bow. And these bows can get massive! You just have to see it after purchasing the Bow-dabra. I am planning a Bow-dabra party for my friends, to show them what all it will do. Summer is a great time to start thinking about Christmas decorations and gift wrapping so it would be fun to let each guest make a bow of their choosing. The guests can either bring their own ribbon and decorations or I could provide those. Either way, it's more fun if you do it yourself and have something to show. Oh, I almost forgot to mention that each bow you make uses a gold wire that is conveniently included in the Bow-dabra box. There is enough for about 10 bows. Do you can get the hang of it before buying more wire. The wire is only used to hold the bow together, so you could probably find some other colors. But I love the gold. It adds elegance to every bow. This is the cutest and most useful craft item I have seen in a long time. You just have to get one and try it for yourself. I LOVE this!###love<5:9>|never<26:31>|bow<41:44>|dabra<45:50>|bow dabra<41:50>|versatile<94:103>|wait<117:121>|bow<130:133>|bow<130:134>|include<138:145>|gift<149:153>|gift<149:154>|child<160:168>|hair<171:175>|decoration<186:197>|bow<203:206>|dabra<207:212>|bow dabra<203:212>|instruction<227:238>|book<239:243>|extra<285:290>|include<300:307>|include<300:308>|a dvd<309:314>|dvd<311:314>|dvd<375:378>|section<395:403>|type<431:435>|bow<439:442>|watch<473:478>|entire<483:489>|tiny<542:546>|bow<547:550>|bow<547:551>|hair<556:560>|decorative<562:572>|bow<573:576>|bow<573:577>|decorative bow<562:577>|package<582:590>|bow<592:595>|bow<592:596>|include<602:609>|foil<610:614>|decoration<615:626>|flower<637:644>|include<678:685>|bow<693:696>|scrap<738:744>|gorgeous<765:773>|bow<774:777>|bow<789:792>|bow<789:793>|bow<856:859>|bow dabra<856:865>|dabra<860:865>|plan<872:880>|bow<883:886>|dabra<887:892>|bow dabra<883:892>|party<893:898>|friend<906:913>|show<918:922>|summer<949:955>|start<975:980>|christmas<996:1005>|christmas decoration<996:1017>|decoration<1006:1017>|gift<1022:1026>|wrapping<1027:1035>|gift wrapping<1022:1035>|fun<1051:1054>|let<1058:1061>|guest<1067:1072>|bow<1080:1083>|guest<1107:1112>|guest<1107:1113>|bring<1125:1130>|own<1137:1140>|decoration<1152:1163>|provide<1175:1182>|fun<1212:1215>|show<1260:1264>|most<1274:1278>|almost<1272:1278>|forget<1279:1285>|mention<1289:1296>|bow<1307:1310>|gold<1327:1331>|wire<1332:1336>|include<1358:1365>|include<1358:1366>|bow<1374:1377>|bow dabra<1374:1383>|dabra<1378:1383>|box<1384:1387>|bow<1418:1421>|bow<1418:1422>|hang<1443:1447>|wire<1473:1477>|wire<1483:1487>|hold<1504:1508>|bow<1513:1516>|together<1517:1525>|probably<1540:1548>|find<1549:1553>|love<1579:1583>|gold<1588:1592>|add<1597:1601>|elegance<1602:1610>|bow<1620:1623>|cut<1637:1643>|most<1648:1652>|useful<1653:1659>|craft<1660:1665>|long<1688:1692>|long time<1688:1697>|a long time<1686:1697>|love<1751:1755>

ATTR_1535: making necklaces###necklace<7:16><<|||B09MBZC8Q8 ★★★☆☆ [2020-09-26] Nice, with a couple of issues. This ribbon looks nice enough if you just need something to use to hang thinga with, but I was disappointed for several reasons. The first is my fault: I really didn't do the math well when I ordered this, and I just didn't realize how short a length I would get off each color. Some of these colors are gorgeous, but others I know I'm unlikely to use again. That tends to mean the colors I don't like will pile up, if I try to re-purchase more of the ones I do like - and that will happen quickly, with only 1 yard of each color. I really, really hate the way these were packed. The product picture shows each color rolled separately, but that's not what you get. Instead, you get about a half-dozen large rolls, which contain multiple colors. Without unrolling each one, it's impossible to see what's there. Because of this before I could even use the ribbon, I spent an hour and a half unrolling the big rolls and making small, individual rolls with each color. After that, I can see and access them all easily. But honestly, I really had much better things to do with my time than repack 30 yards of ribbon. The quality isn't bad. I had hoped for thicker ribbon, as I planned to use these to make necklaces and I want them to last. A thicker pile to the ribbon would prevent it from wrinkling too easily, and would keep it from looking prematurely worn. Anything I make from these, I will have to charge a bit less for and warn customers that the necklace cord will eventually wear out. What I do like: many of these colors are stunning. It is nice to have a sampler to allow me to figure out what I need most. I really hope that they hold up better than I am expecting. Time will tell. If all you need is ribbons for trim, or to hang ornaments from, these are a good choice. I think, however, they for my purposes, I am going to have to keep looking for higher quality.###couple<16:22>|a couple<14:22>|issue<26:32>|hang<105:109>|disappoint<133:145>|re<158:160>|reason<158:165>|fault<183:188>|re<192:194>|the math<209:217>|math<213:217>|re<234:236>|re<262:264>|realize<262:269>|short<274:279>|length<282:288>|re<339:341>|gorgeous<342:350>|unlikely<374:382>|again<390:395>|tend<402:407>|mean<411:415>|pile<445:449>|re<466:468>|re<480:482>|one<490:493>|one<490:494>|happen<521:527>|quickly<528:535>|1 yard<547:553>|yard<549:553>|re<571:573>|re<579:581>|hate<586:590>|re<607:609>|pack<610:616>|re<635:637>|picture<630:637>|show<638:643>|roll<655:661>|instead<703:710>|half<728:732>|large<739:744>|roll<745:750>|large roll<739:750>|contain<758:765>|multiple<766:774>|unroll<791:800>|one<806:809>|impossible<816:826>|re<844:846>|re<868:870>|spend<902:907>|an hour<908:915>|hour<911:915>|half<922:926>|unroll<927:936>|big<941:944>|roll<945:950>|big roll<941:950>|small<962:967>|individual<969:979>|roll<980:985>|individual roll<969:985>|access<1029:1035>|easily<1045:1051>|one<1058:1061>|one<1058:1062>|honestly<1057:1065>|re<1069:1071>|re<1123:1125>|yard<1133:1137>|yard<1133:1138>|30 yard<1130:1138>|hope<1179:1183>|hope<1179:1184>|thick<1189:1196>|plan<1210:1217>|necklace<1239:1247>|necklace<1239:1248>|thick<1276:1283>|pile<1284:1288>|re<1310:1312>|prevent<1309:1316>|wrinkle<1325:1334>|easily<1339:1345>|keep<1357:1361>|re<1379:1381>|re<1385:1387>|worn<1390:1394>|charge<1439:1445>|less<1452:1456>|warn<1465:1469>|customer<1470:1479>|necklace<1489:1497>|cord<1498:1502>|eventually<1508:1518>|wear<1519:1523>|re<1567:1569>|stunning<1570:1578>|allow<1612:1617>|re<1628:1630>|figure<1624:1630>|most<1647:1651>|re<1655:1657>|hope<1662:1666>|hold<1677:1681>|trim<1760:1764>|hang<1772:1776>|ornament<1777:1786>|re<1800:1802>|choice<1810:1816>|however<1827:1834>|purpose<1848:1856>|keep<1880:1884>|high<1897:1903>|high quality<1897:1911>

perf_1207: Making jewelry###jewelry<7:14><<|pony<21:25>|pony bead<21:31>|bead<26:31>|||B09XM6ZN1Q ★★★★☆ [2022-09-17] We had a lot of fun threading pony beads onto the green 💚 today These really nice multicolored skinny ribbons can be used for all kinds of arts and crafts. Cards scrapbooking adorning clothing, hats you name it this sky's the limit. I like how the 20 colors of 100 yards of ribbon come in a nice display package with little indentations to keep each roll. That's really neat. I did notice that a couple of my 🌈 rainbow colors had less on the roll than the other rolls had, so I don't know what's up with that but every inch counts. Today my mom and I decided to string some really nice pony beads I'm also testing onto a length of the lime green ribbon. To make sure that the beads would stay on for my mom we knotted one near the bottom of one end of the length that I kind of measured not with tape just kind of put it around my neck and figured out how big I'd want it for it to go over her neck easy. Since we both shake with essential tremor, I wanted to make it easier for her to string the thin ribbon into the big pony bead openings. So I wrapped some Scotch tape around the other end. I wish I could show you that first video I made for you guys. I had it too thick and somehow I also had it the tape on slow motion? So it's really weird but it would take too long to upload I'm sure. Also my mom was joking with me and pulling the tip of the ribbon away so I couldn't stick the little bead on. It was funny you had to be there I guess haha just imagine it. 😜 Anyway, I made the tape narrower and it finally worked perfectly for my mom to string the beads on. It gives her practice with patterning and remembering colors and just hand eye coordination and all those mental gymnastics we need to do to keep our aging brains sharp. Plus she loves jewelry so making her own is even better. It's great how this pack of ribbon gives you so many colors at once without you having to buy 10,000 yards of each. perf_1094: Projects that won't be laundered###project<0:8><<Seems high quality, will have to test for color fastness Seems high quality black ribbon, appeared to have the dye come off when I wet it and was ironing it in case it shrank a little once it was part of my project and laundered. I could clearly see the lighter ribbon underneath but must’ve been from heating the material because it’s been drying awhile now and appears back to all black. The spool read “washing fastness test” so perhaps it is color fast. I’ll have to wash some by hand to test before I use though. Update: I had goofed before when I wrote the above review. I had looked at the wrong place on the spool and thought the iron had only temporarily made a color change with the heat but in fact I found the place where I hit it with an iron and the dye is indeed gone. I’ve been shrinking ribbons for years by wetting and pressing and it’s never happened before. It’ll be a lovely ribbon for projects that won’t be laundered but I wouldn’t trust it to be color fast during laundering. trim###trim<0:4>|||B09MBZC8Q8 ★★★☆☆ [2020-09-26] Nice, with a couple of issues. This ribbon looks nice enough if you just need something to use to hang thinga with, but I was disappointed for several reasons. The first is my fault: I really didn't do the math well when I ordered this, and I just didn't realize how short a length I would get off each color. Some of these colors are gorgeous, but others I know I'm unlikely to use again. That tends to mean the colors I don't like will pile up, if I try to re-purchase more of the ones I do like - and that will happen quickly, with only 1 yard of each color. I really, really hate the way these were packed. The product picture shows each color rolled separately, but that's not what you get. Instead, you get about a half-dozen large rolls, which contain multiple colors. Without unrolling each one, it's impossible to see what's there. Because of this before I could even use the ribbon, I spent an hour and a half unrolling the big rolls and making small, individual rolls with each color. After that, I can see and access them all easily. But honestly, I really had much better things to do with my time than repack 30 yards of ribbon. The quality isn't bad. I had hoped for thicker ribbon, as I planned to use these to make necklaces and I want them to last. A thicker pile to the ribbon would prevent it from wrinkling too easily, and would keep it from looking prematurely worn. Anything I make from these, I will have to charge a bit less for and warn customers that the necklace cord will eventually wear out. What I do like: many of these colors are stunning. It is nice to have a sampler to allow me to figure out what I need most. I really hope that they hold up better than I am expecting. Time will tell. If all you need is ribbons for trim, or to hang ornaments from, these are a good choice. I think, however, they for my purposes, I am going to have to keep looking for higher quality.###couple<16:22>|a couple<14:22>|issue<26:32>|hang<105:109>|disappoint<133:145>|re<158:160>|reason<158:165>|fault<183:188>|re<192:194>|the math<209:217>|math<213:217>|re<234:236>|re<262:264>|realize<262:269>|short<274:279>|length<282:288>|re<339:341>|gorgeous<342:350>|unlikely<374:382>|again<390:395>|tend<402:407>|mean<411:415>|pile<445:449>|re<466:468>|re<480:482>|one<490:493>|one<490:494>|happen<521:527>|quickly<528:535>|1 yard<547:553>|yard<549:553>|re<571:573>|re<579:581>|hate<586:590>|re<607:609>|pack<610:616>|re<635:637>|picture<630:637>|show<638:643>|roll<655:661>|instead<703:710>|half<728:732>|large<739:744>|roll<745:750>|large roll<739:750>|contain<758:765>|multiple<766:774>|unroll<791:800>|one<806:809>|impossible<816:826>|re<844:846>|re<868:870>|spend<902:907>|an hour<908:915>|hour<911:915>|half<922:926>|unroll<927:936>|big<941:944>|roll<945:950>|big roll<941:950>|small<962:967>|individual<969:979>|roll<980:985>|individual roll<969:985>|access<1029:1035>|easily<1045:1051>|one<1058:1061>|one<1058:1062>|honestly<1057:1065>|re<1069:1071>|re<1123:1125>|yard<1133:1137>|yard<1133:1138>|30 yard<1130:1138>|hope<1179:1183>|hope<1179:1184>|thick<1189:1196>|plan<1210:1217>|necklace<1239:1247>|necklace<1239:1248>|thick<1276:1283>|pile<1284:1288>|re<1310:1312>|prevent<1309:1316>|wrinkle<1325:1334>|easily<1339:1345>|keep<1357:1361>|re<1379:1381>|re<1385:1387>|worn<1390:1394>|charge<1439:1445>|less<1452:1456>|warn<1465:1469>|customer<1470:1479>|necklace<1489:1497>|cord<1498:1502>|eventually<1508:1518>|wear<1519:1523>|re<1567:1569>|stunning<1570:1578>|allow<1612:1617>|re<1628:1630>|figure<1624:1630>|most<1647:1651>|re<1655:1657>|hope<1662:1666>|hold<1677:1681>|trim<1760:1764>|hang<1772:1776>|ornament<1777:1786>|re<1800:1802>|choice<1810:1816>|however<1827:1834>|purpose<1848:1856>|keep<1880:1884>|high<1897:1903>|high quality<1897:1911>

ATTR_9: sewing###sew<0:6><<|||B0CJF46LNB ★★★★☆ [2023-12-03] Pretty velvet ribbon, as pictured This ribbon is just what I expected it to be. The pink color is accurately represented, and the plush face of the ribbon looks really nice. The downside is the same with any velvet ribbon -- it's inherently challenging to work with for tying bows. That is true with every velvet ribbon I've ever had, so I do not consider that a flaw in the product. That's just the nature of velvet. If you've never worked with velvet ribbon before, just know that part going in. I am not using this ribbon for sewing, but having handled it and examined it, I do think that it would be appropriate for a sewing project. The material is on the heavier side, it doesn't have a wired edge, and it doesn't seem to fray too badly. The ribbons are of good quality and the designs are clear and crisp. The variety is great as you can match the more obvious Grinch themes with the more neutral. hanging ornaments###hang<0:7>|ornament<8:17>|||B09MBZC8Q8 ★★★☆☆ [2020-09-26] Nice, with a couple of issues. This ribbon looks nice enough if you just need something to use to hang thinga with, but I was disappointed for several reasons. The first is my fault: I really didn't do the math well when I ordered this, and I just didn't realize how short a length I would get off each color. Some of these colors are gorgeous, but others I know I'm unlikely to use again. That tends to mean the colors I don't like will pile up, if I try to re-purchase more of the ones I do like - and that will happen quickly, with only 1 yard of each color. I really, really hate the way these were packed. The product picture shows each color rolled separately, but that's not what you get. Instead, you get about a half-dozen large rolls, which contain multiple colors. Without unrolling each one, it's impossible to see what's there. Because of this before I could even use the ribbon, I spent an hour and a half unrolling the big rolls and making small, individual rolls with each color. After that, I can see and access them all easily. But honestly, I really had much better things to do with my time than repack 30 yards of ribbon. The quality isn't bad. I had hoped for thicker ribbon, as I planned to use these to make necklaces and I want them to last. A thicker pile to the ribbon would prevent it from wrinkling too easily, and would keep it from looking prematurely worn. Anything I make from these, I will have to charge a bit less for and warn customers that the necklace cord will eventually wear out. What I do like: many of these colors are stunning. It is nice to have a sampler to allow me to figure out what I need most. I really hope that they hold up better than I am expecting. Time will tell. If all you need is ribbons for trim, or to hang ornaments from, these are a good choice. I think, however, they for my purposes, I am going to have to keep looking for higher quality.###couple<16:22>|a couple<14:22>|issue<26:32>|hang<105:109>|disappoint<133:145>|re<158:160>|reason<158:165>|fault<183:188>|re<192:194>|the math<209:217>|math<213:217>|re<234:236>|re<262:264>|realize<262:269>|short<274:279>|length<282:288>|re<339:341>|gorgeous<342:350>|unlikely<374:382>|again<390:395>|tend<402:407>|mean<411:415>|pile<445:449>|re<466:468>|re<480:482>|one<490:493>|one<490:494>|happen<521:527>|quickly<528:535>|1 yard<547:553>|yard<549:553>|re<571:573>|re<579:581>|hate<586:590>|re<607:609>|pack<610:616>|re<635:637>|picture<630:637>|show<638:643>|roll<655:661>|instead<703:710>|half<728:732>|large<739:744>|roll<745:750>|large roll<739:750>|contain<758:765>|multiple<766:774>|unroll<791:800>|one<806:809>|impossible<816:826>|re<844:846>|re<868:870>|spend<902:907>|an hour<908:915>|hour<911:915>|half<922:926>|unroll<927:936>|big<941:944>|roll<945:950>|big roll<941:950>|small<962:967>|individual<969:979>|roll<980:985>|individual roll<969:985>|access<1029:1035>|easily<1045:1051>|one<1058:1061>|one<1058:1062>|honestly<1057:1065>|re<1069:1071>|re<1123:1125>|yard<1133:1137>|yard<1133:1138>|30 yard<1130:1138>|hope<1179:1183>|hope<1179:1184>|thick<1189:1196>|plan<1210:1217>|necklace<1239:1247>|necklace<1239:1248>|thick<1276:1283>|pile<1284:1288>|re<1310:1312>|prevent<1309:1316>|wrinkle<1325:1334>|easily<1339:1345>|keep<1357:1361>|re<1379:1381>|re<1385:1387>|worn<1390:1394>|charge<1439:1445>|less<1452:1456>|warn<1465:1469>|customer<1470:1479>|necklace<1489:1497>|cord<1498:1502>|eventually<1508:1518>|wear<1519:1523>|re<1567:1569>|stunning<1570:1578>|allow<1612:1617>|re<1628:1630>|figure<1624:1630>|most<1647:1651>|re<1655:1657>|hope<1662:1666>|hold<1677:1681>|trim<1760:1764>|hang<1772:1776>|ornament<1777:1786>|re<1800:1802>|choice<1810:1816>|however<1827:1834>|purpose<1848:1856>|keep<1880:1884>|high<1897:1903>|high quality<1897:1911>

It just doesn’t look tidy when the “bad side” of a one sided ribbon shows up after tying a bow. Other Positives: 1) The colors are vivid, there are 20 colors. Two of the colors are gold and silver. perf_2135: Christmas decorations###christmas<0:9>|decoration<10:21>|christmas decoration<0:21><<|create<13:21>|different<22:31>|type<32:37>|bow<41:45>|||B0C24XWHW4 ★★★★★ [2023-05-20] I LOVE this! I had never heard of Bow-dabra before seeing this on Amazon. And it is so versatile I can hardly wait to make bows to include on gifts, for children's hair, and even decorations. The Bow-dabra comes with an instruction book which is great but the creators went the extra mile and included a DVD to demonstrate just what you can do with it. VERY nice. The DVD is divided into sections so you can go right to the type of bow you want to make. Or, you can watch the entire thing all the way through which I did. You can make tiny bows for hair, decorative bows for packages, bows that include foil decorations, berries, flowers, or anything you can think of to include in the bow. They even demonstrate how to use up old scraps of ribbon to make a gorgeous bow. And these bows can get massive! You just have to see it after purchasing the Bow-dabra. I am planning a Bow-dabra party for my friends, to show them what all it will do. Summer is a great time to start thinking about Christmas decorations and gift wrapping so it would be fun to let each guest make a bow of their choosing. The guests can either bring their own ribbon and decorations or I could provide those. Either way, it's more fun if you do it yourself and have something to show. Oh, I almost forgot to mention that each bow you make uses a gold wire that is conveniently included in the Bow-dabra box. There is enough for about 10 bows. Do you can get the hang of it before buying more wire. The wire is only used to hold the bow together, so you could probably find some other colors. But I love the gold. It adds elegance to every bow. This is the cutest and most useful craft item I have seen in a long time. You just have to get one and try it for yourself. I LOVE this!###love<5:9>|never<26:31>|bow<41:44>|dabra<45:50>|bow dabra<41:50>|versatile<94:103>|wait<117:121>|bow<130:133>|bow<130:134>|include<138:145>|gift<149:153>|gift<149:154>|child<160:168>|hair<171:175>|decoration<186:197>|bow<203:206>|dabra<207:212>|bow dabra<203:212>|instruction<227:238>|book<239:243>|extra<285:290>|include<300:307>|include<300:308>|a dvd<309:314>|dvd<311:314>|dvd<375:378>|section<395:403>|type<431:435>|bow<439:442>|watch<473:478>|entire<483:489>|tiny<542:546>|bow<547:550>|bow<547:551>|hair<556:560>|decorative<562:572>|bow<573:576>|bow<573:577>|decorative bow<562:577>|package<582:590>|bow<592:595>|bow<592:596>|include<602:609>|foil<610:614>|decoration<615:626>|flower<637:644>|include<678:685>|bow<693:696>|scrap<738:744>|gorgeous<765:773>|bow<774:777>|bow<789:792>|bow<789:793>|bow<856:859>|bow dabra<856:865>|dabra<860:865>|plan<872:880>|bow<883:886>|dabra<887:892>|bow dabra<883:892>|party<893:898>|friend<906:913>|show<918:922>|summer<949:955>|start<975:980>|christmas<996:1005>|christmas decoration<996:1017>|decoration<1006:1017>|gift<1022:1026>|wrapping<1027:1035>|gift wrapping<1022:1035>|fun<1051:1054>|let<1058:1061>|guest<1067:1072>|bow<1080:1083>|guest<1107:1112>|guest<1107:1113>|bring<1125:1130>|own<1137:1140>|decoration<1152:1163>|provide<1175:1182>|fun<1212:1215>|show<1260:1264>|most<1274:1278>|almost<1272:1278>|forget<1279:1285>|mention<1289:1296>|bow<1307:1310>|gold<1327:1331>|wire<1332:1336>|include<1358:1365>|include<1358:1366>|bow<1374:1377>|bow dabra<1374:1383>|dabra<1378:1383>|box<1384:1387>|bow<1418:1421>|bow<1418:1422>|hang<1443:1447>|wire<1473:1477>|wire<1483:1487>|hold<1504:1508>|bow<1513:1516>|together<1517:1525>|probably<1540:1548>|find<1549:1553>|love<1579:1583>|gold<1588:1592>|add<1597:1601>|elegance<1602:1610>|bow<1620:1623>|cut<1637:1643>|most<1648:1652>|useful<1653:1659>|craft<1660:1665>|long<1688:1692>|long time<1688:1697>|a long time<1686:1697>|love<1751:1755>

hanging things###hang<0:7>|||B09MBZC8Q8 ★★★☆☆ [2020-09-26] Nice, with a couple of issues. This ribbon looks nice enough if you just need something to use to hang thinga with, but I was disappointed for several reasons. The first is my fault: I really didn't do the math well when I ordered this, and I just didn't realize how short a length I would get off each color. Some of these colors are gorgeous, but others I know I'm unlikely to use again. That tends to mean the colors I don't like will pile up, if I try to re-purchase more of the ones I do like - and that will happen quickly, with only 1 yard of each color. I really, really hate the way these were packed. The product picture shows each color rolled separately, but that's not what you get. Instead, you get about a half-dozen large rolls, which contain multiple colors. Without unrolling each one, it's impossible to see what's there. Because of this before I could even use the ribbon, I spent an hour and a half unrolling the big rolls and making small, individual rolls with each color. After that, I can see and access them all easily. But honestly, I really had much better things to do with my time than repack 30 yards of ribbon. The quality isn't bad. I had hoped for thicker ribbon, as I planned to use these to make necklaces and I want them to last. A thicker pile to the ribbon would prevent it from wrinkling too easily, and would keep it from looking prematurely worn. Anything I make from these, I will have to charge a bit less for and warn customers that the necklace cord will eventually wear out. What I do like: many of these colors are stunning. It is nice to have a sampler to allow me to figure out what I need most. I really hope that they hold up better than I am expecting. Time will tell. If all you need is ribbons for trim, or to hang ornaments from, these are a good choice. I think, however, they for my purposes, I am going to have to keep looking for higher quality.###couple<16:22>|a couple<14:22>|issue<26:32>|hang<105:109>|disappoint<133:145>|re<158:160>|reason<158:165>|fault<183:188>|re<192:194>|the math<209:217>|math<213:217>|re<234:236>|re<262:264>|realize<262:269>|short<274:279>|length<282:288>|re<339:341>|gorgeous<342:350>|unlikely<374:382>|again<390:395>|tend<402:407>|mean<411:415>|pile<445:449>|re<466:468>|re<480:482>|one<490:493>|one<490:494>|happen<521:527>|quickly<528:535>|1 yard<547:553>|yard<549:553>|re<571:573>|re<579:581>|hate<586:590>|re<607:609>|pack<610:616>|re<635:637>|picture<630:637>|show<638:643>|roll<655:661>|instead<703:710>|half<728:732>|large<739:744>|roll<745:750>|large roll<739:750>|contain<758:765>|multiple<766:774>|unroll<791:800>|one<806:809>|impossible<816:826>|re<844:846>|re<868:870>|spend<902:907>|an hour<908:915>|hour<911:915>|half<922:926>|unroll<927:936>|big<941:944>|roll<945:950>|big roll<941:950>|small<962:967>|individual<969:979>|roll<980:985>|individual roll<969:985>|access<1029:1035>|easily<1045:1051>|one<1058:1061>|one<1058:1062>|honestly<1057:1065>|re<1069:1071>|re<1123:1125>|yard<1133:1137>|yard<1133:1138>|30 yard<1130:1138>|hope<1179:1183>|hope<1179:1184>|thick<1189:1196>|plan<1210:1217>|necklace<1239:1247>|necklace<1239:1248>|thick<1276:1283>|pile<1284:1288>|re<1310:1312>|prevent<1309:1316>|wrinkle<1325:1334>|easily<1339:1345>|keep<1357:1361>|re<1379:1381>|re<1385:1387>|worn<1390:1394>|charge<1439:1445>|less<1452:1456>|warn<1465:1469>|customer<1470:1479>|necklace<1489:1497>|cord<1498:1502>|eventually<1508:1518>|wear<1519:1523>|re<1567:1569>|stunning<1570:1578>|allow<1612:1617>|re<1628:1630>|figure<1624:1630>|most<1647:1651>|re<1655:1657>|hope<1662:1666>|hold<1677:1681>|trim<1760:1764>|hang<1772:1776>|ornament<1777:1786>|re<1800:1802>|choice<1810:1816>|however<1827:1834>|purpose<1848:1856>|keep<1880:1884>|high<1897:1903>|high quality<1897:1911>

ATTR_205: house decor###house<0:5>|decor<6:11><<|||B09QS757YZ ★★★★★ [2022-10-17] Fringe elegance I'm not much on gift wrapping, but there are occasions . . . These ribbons look great on gift packages, but for me they are useful for much more. ATTR_2478: Tying gift boxes###tie<0:5>|gift<6:10>|gift box<6:16>|box<11:16><<|feel<6:10>|||B09TZRN79Q ★★★★★ [2022-12-14] Absolutely Elegant I needed a vintage style ribbon to tie up some gift boxes for a Christmas order and I thought one spool would work for 7 boxes. Unfortunately I had measured wrong and ended up short by one box. To cover the shortage, I went to the local fabric store and got their house brand and the difference is huge! The Vatin ribbon is on the left, and the chain fabric store's house brand is on the right in the picture. perf_2107: Assembling scraps into reusable and presentable form###assemble<0:10>|scrap<11:17>|reusable<23:31>|presentable<36:47>|form<48:52><<|project<6:13>|place<17:22>|||B0C24XWHW4 ★★★★☆ [2023-05-23] Simple Tool to Simplify Bow Making This Bowdabra Hairbow Making hit is a great tool for holding your project in place for consistent and tightly crafted bows each time. It best assists when working with multiple materials and/or layers but is easiest to learn on single layered bows. This device would be most useful as a gift for individuals who experience pain, fatigue, or difficulty with fine motor movements. This set arrives with the main gadget, a ruler that slots on top and then a piece to evenly scrunch down your DIY bow. In addition, it also includes a CD-ROM, membership on the website and a roll of metallic tie. Personally, I feel as though the CD-ROM format is very dated; in order to access the tutorial, there is an application that must run. This did not launch on my computer and I could not gain access to it despite many attempts. I also accessed the website and the PDF walkthroughs to best understand how to complete a bow with the assistance of this device. It was well explained in the written guides online, with step-by-step instructions and visuals. The idea behind this tool is useful, but more-so for individuals looking for a quick way to assemble their scraps into a reusable and presentable form. A lot of the styles in the provided examples are dated and much more appropriate for an older crowd. The number one feature I found was that this holds your material in place while you assemble and tie it all together. Otherwise, it is a very simplistic device with more of a purpose for those who may have difficulty with fine motor skills but want to design and complete decorative bows on their Book markers###book<0:4>|marker<5:12>|||B08P9NPY3P ★★☆☆☆ [2023-11-03] EXTREMELY THIN AND NOT DOUBLE FACED As the old adage goes, “You get what you pay for”, KINDA? VALUE: If this ribbon was going to the trash with wrapping paper, $4.99 for 100 yards is a good value. I’m giving the supplier credit that there actually are 100 yards on the roll. Unfortunately I bought this ribbon to serve as page markers for a Bible rebind. So, this ribbon is just too cheap looking and flimsy for that use. Value for me is zero. QUALITY: mediocre to poor, extremely thin material with almost invisible edge detail. PACKAGING: Unlike ribbon sold at brick and mortar stores, this roll came rolled around a core and in a cellophane envelope, but with no chip board sides to prevent the entire roll from falling off the sides of the core and totally tangling. PRODUCT LISTENING: Sold as Dark Red Double Faced Color is subjective but this roll of Dk Red appears to this purchaser to be closer to Light Red Wine in color. With a decidedly different texture on the reverse side, it is highly doubtful that this can be considered “Double Faced”. SUMMARY: If you are looking for ribbon for decoration, say for hair ribbons or seasonal decor, or for more permanent items like sewing into a dress or to make book markers, look elsewhere. If you only want to tie up a quick gift, or need wine colored string, go for it.###extremely<3:12>|thin<13:17>|double<26:32>|double faced<26:38>|faced<33:38>|pay<84:87>|kinda<94:99>|trash<140:145>|wrapping<151:159>|paper<160:165>|wrapping paper<151:165>|100 yard<177:186>|yard<181:186>|give<208:214>|supplier<219:227>|actually<246:254>|yard<263:268>|100 yard<259:268>|roll<276:280>|unfortunately<282:295>|serve<320:325>|page<329:333>|marker<334:341>|bible<348:353>|cheap<390:395>|looking<396:403>|cheap looking<390:403>|flimsy<408:414>|extremely<478:487>|thin<488:492>|material<493:501>|thin material<488:501>|almost<507:513>|edge<524:528>|detail<529:535>|packaging<537:546>|sell<562:566>|store<587:593>|roll<600:604>|roll<610:614>|roll<610:616>|core<626:630>|cellophane<640:650>|envelope<651:659>|board<678:683>|side<684:688>|side<684:689>|prevent<693:700>|entire<705:711>|roll<712:716>|the entire roll<701:716>|entire roll<705:716>|fall<722:729>|side<738:742>|side<738:743>|core<751:755>|totally<760:767>|tangle<768:776>|sell<797:801>|dark<805:809>|red<810:813>|dark red<805:813>|double<814:820>|faced<821:826>|double faced<814:826>|roll<856:860>|dk<864:866>|red<867:870>|appear<871:878>|close<903:909>|light<913:918>|red<919:922>|wine<923:927>|red wine<919:927>|different<955:964>|texture<965:972>|reverse<980:987>|side<988:992>|highly<1000:1006>|side<1036:1040>|consider<1033:1043>|double<1045:1051>|double faced<1045:1057>|faced<1052:1057>|looking<1080:1087>|decor<1103:1108>|decoration<1103:1113>|hair<1123:1127>|seasonal<1139:1147>|decor<1148:1153>|permanent<1167:1176>|sew<1188:1194>|dress<1202:1207>|book<1219:1223>|marker<1224:1231>|elsewhere<1238:1247>|tie<1269:1272>|gift<1284:1288>|wine<1298:1302>|colored<1303:1310>|string<1311:1317>

perf_1206: Scrapbooking###scrapbooke<0:12><<|art<24:28>|craft<33:39>|||B09XM6ZN1Q ★★★★☆ [2022-09-17] We had a lot of fun threading pony beads onto the green 💚 today These really nice multicolored skinny ribbons can be used for all kinds of arts and crafts. Cards scrapbooking adorning clothing, hats you name it this sky's the limit. I like how the 20 colors of 100 yards of ribbon come in a nice display package with little indentations to keep each roll. That's really neat. I did notice that a couple of my 🌈 rainbow colors had less on the roll than the other rolls had, so I don't know what's up with that but every inch counts. Today my mom and I decided to string some really nice pony beads I'm also testing onto a length of the lime green ribbon. To make sure that the beads would stay on for my mom we knotted one near the bottom of one end of the length that I kind of measured not with tape just kind of put it around my neck and figured out how big I'd want it for it to go over her neck easy. Since we both shake with essential tremor, I wanted to make it easier for her to string the thin ribbon into the big pony bead openings. So I wrapped some Scotch tape around the other end. I wish I could show you that first video I made for you guys. I had it too thick and somehow I also had it the tape on slow motion? So it's really weird but it would take too long to upload I'm sure. Also my mom was joking with me and pulling the tip of the ribbon away so I couldn't stick the little bead on. It was funny you had to be there I guess haha just imagine it. 😜 Anyway, I made the tape narrower and it finally worked perfectly for my mom to string the beads on. It gives her practice with patterning and remembering colors and just hand eye coordination and all those mental gymnastics we need to do to keep our aging brains sharp. Plus she loves jewelry so making her own is even better. It's great how this pack of ribbon gives you so many colors at once without you having to buy 10,000 yards of each. perf_1546: Tying around folded bills in cards###tie<0:5>|fold<13:19>|bill<20:25>|card<29:34><<|wrong side<3:13>|show<14:21>|tie<27:31>|||B07X9K54CH ★★★★★ [2022-01-06] Good go-to double-face satin ribbon. This ribbon is silky, glossy and strong. Double-face means no matter how you tie bows or knots, there are no ‘wrong’ sides showing. Dozens of uses, especially at the holidays. When I want to give ‘thank you’ cash to mail person, UPS, FedEx, Amazon drivers, recycle and landfill and yard waste bin pick-up people, etc., I tape a length of this narrow ribbon inside each holiday card and tie it around the bills I’ve folded to fit. Thus makes me sound like Lady Bountiful on Boxing Day, but that couldn’t be further from the truth.
